title: Is Facebook Forwarding Standing Rock Protester Profiles to DHS, FBI?
subtitle: According to rumors, a Facebook popup window is warning Standing Rock protesters that their account histories are being intercepted by the federal government.
author: Kim LaCapria
vclaim: Facebook pop-up windows are warning that the Department of Homeland Security (acting under a bill known as CISPA) is forwarding entire Facebook histories of Standing Rock protesters to the Federal Bureau of Investigation.
